items.desc: It's small and sharp. A classic.
You can hold it in one hand. Think of the possibilities.
You're going to need a second hand for this one.
Cuts down trees, among other things.
It's like a regular axe, but for battle.
Spear meets axe, it can do it all.
Let's be honest, it's a stick.
A stick with a sharp thing on the end.
A big spear. No friend to horses.
A blunt weapon with a heavy head on the end of a handle.
For nails. Also, skulls.
The ol' ball-and-chain. And spikes.
A more accurate ranged weapon that packs a punch.
A ranged weapon that can be used in tight spaces, and while on the move.
A simple ranged weapon.
An easy to use ranged weapon, takes time to reload.
A three-pronged spear.
A knife with an inwardly curved blade.
A curved sword.
A slender, pointed sword.
Machete meets sword.
A pole weapon, generally used by mounted soldiers.
A gardening tool. Also, a murdering tool.
A polearm, with a single edged blade at the head.
A long spear-like weapon generally used in fishing.
A small, single-edged sword.
A light spear, primarily for throwing.

tags.desc: Nearly always strikes true.
Hard to maneuver with.
Easy to hide, hard to find.
Has a tendency to kill whatever ends up in front of it.
You're going to fight, and look good doing it.
There's no way to know what will happen when you use this.
A truly large weapon. Requires great strength to use, and takes up a lot of space.
Makes a lot of noise for some reason. Huh.
Not available in most markets, may be illegal to own.
Can sneak through an enemy's defenses with ease.
Incredible impact when an attack connects.
The wielder seems more likely to strike their friends.
Sends a chill through its enemies.
Seems to always strike true.
Enemies struck by this weapon have a chance of becoming infected.
Enemies struck by this weapon become cursed.
Corrodes the weapons and armor it comes into contact with.
The weapon's balance makes it harder to connect a strike, but you also become harder to hit.
The wielder becomes enraged while using this.
Pushes away anyone who is hit by it.
After hitting an enemy with this weapon, they are stuck by a second weaker spectral version of this weapon.
The souls of those killed by this weapon are stored in a gem embedded in it.
You move faster while wielding this.

items.desc: Armor made from metalic rings sewn into a leather or fabric foundation.
A thick defensive jacket.
Made of boiled leather.
Leather armor with metal studs.
Armor made from the hide of an animal.
Consists of a leather base with overlapping pieces of metal.
Armor made of small metal rings linked together to form a mesh.
Limb armor where strips of metal are attached to a fabric foundation.
A combination of chainmail and metal plates protecting vital areas.
Armor made entirely of plate.
A small, round shield.
Offers very little protection
Wooden or steel, provides decent protection.
Large, heavy shield. Good at blocking missine fire.

tags.desc: You become resistant to a type of damage.
Odorless smoke rises from this while being worn.

items.desc: Object with magical properties.
Jewelry for your finger.
Like a pendant.
Small metal disc with a design on both sides.
Keeps your pants up.
Like a necklace.
A large book.
A handheld telescope.
Cup for drinking.
They cover your hands.
A protective enclosure for a light source.
A small liquid container.
A piece of currency from a far away land.
A small globe-like figurine.
The horn from a member of the deer family.
A loose outer garment.

tags.desc: An ancient organic gemstone, made of tree resin.
Violet colored quartz.
A green gemstone.
An ornamental mineral, generally green.
A spotted gemstone.
A crystallic mineral, generally clear.
A highly valuable precious gemstone.
A highly valuable precious gemstone.
An opaque, blue-green mineral.
A highly valuable, and incredibly strong, gemstone.
An unfamiliar item, may not be able to grasp initially.
Not a particulary well made item.
Can't be destroyed, no matter how hard you try.
Others will tremble in fear when they see this.
There isn't anything exiting or unique about this.
The stuff of nightmares.
Crafted by the most skilled artisans. A truly unique item.
Much heavier than you would expect it to be.
Takes up a ton of space. Hard to maneuver with.
Others will have a hard time spotting this.
Easy to lift and stow.
Still technically useable, but it's falling apart.
Radiates with magical energy.
A truly rare item.
Works as expected, except when it doesn't
Incredibly valuable.
Constantly emits a low buzzing sound.
You become more aware of your surroundings.
Once per day, this will alow you to pass through a solid object.
Vibrates when enemies are nearby.
You more easily pass unnoticed.
Small plants sprout around it if buried in the ground overnight.
From a time gone by.
Can withstand incredible stress.
Emits a holy aura that strikes fear into unholy abominations.
Enemies struck by this weapon become cursed.
Belonged to a hero from another age.
Almost ready to break.
You knoe when enemies are nearby.
Emits an aura of protection for nearby friends.
You can only speak Abyssal while wearing or using this.
